arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim gives his verdict on Rasmus Hojlund's rant at 'criminal' Diogo Dalot as Man United are left frustrated by draw at Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Man United were left ruing an opportunity missed after Thursday's 1-1 draw at Real Sociedad. They took the lead in through Joshua Zirkzee but were pegged back by a Mikel Oyarzabal penalty.

arts.ttl: “They are one of the best teams in Europe” – Real Sociedad manager Imanol Alguacil on Manchester United
arts.sum: Real Sociedad are in a rather precarious position in their Europa League tie with Manchester United, following a 1-1 draw in the first leg on Thursday. However, it could have been worse, as they had trailed at the Reale Arena before Mikel Oyarzabal scored from the penalty spot. It was a relatively poor performance from […] The post “They are one of the best teams in Europe” – Real Sociedad manager Imanol Alguacil on Manchester United appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Paul Scholes gives verdict on 'strange' penalty decision against Bruno Fernandes as Man United are held to a draw at Real Sociedad
arts.sum: The hosts were given the opportunity to level proceedings 20 minutes from time when VAR official Pol van Boekel spotted that Fernandes had handled the ball with his left arm in the area.

arts.ttl: Paul Scholes slams Alejandro Garnacho for 'sulking' AGAIN after being substituted in Man United's draw with Real Sociedad - just a week he did the same against Ipswich
arts.sum: United's poor form continued on Thursday night as they drew 1-1 with the LaLiga side in the Europa League, with Joshua Zirkzee 's opener cancelled out following a handball.

arts.ttl: Man United Star's Poor Season Hit New Low In Real Sociedad Draw
arts.sum: Manchester United's Alejandro Garnacho has come under fire despite grabbing an assist in the 1-1 draw against Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad 1-1 Man Utd: Match report & 3 talking points as first leg hands Red Devils slight advantage
arts.sum: Analysing the key talking points from Man Utd's 1-1 draw with Real Sociedad in the Europa League last 16 first leg.

arts.ttl: Man Utd draw at Real Sociedad after Fernandes gives away penalty
arts.sum: Manchester United had to settle for a 1-1 draw at Real Sociedad in their Europa League round of 16 first leg after Bruno Fernandes gave away a penalty for handball.

arts.ttl: Joshua Zirkzee strike sees Man Utd draw with Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Joshua Zirkzee put United into a deserved lead.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad vs. Manchester United: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Bruno Fernandes VAR controversy leaves tie on edge
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Thursday's Europa League clash between Real Sociedad and Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad 1-1 Man Utd: Player ratings as last 16 first leg ends all square
arts.sum: Player ratings from the Europa League clash between Real Sociedad and Manchester United in San Sebastian.
